    R

    R_Order - Class in remote
    The order processing handling.
    R_Order(String) - Constructor for class remote.R_Order
     
    R_StockR - Class in remote
    Implements Read access to the stock list, the stock list is held in a relational DataBase.
    R_StockR(String) - Constructor for class remote.R_StockR
     
    R_StockRW - Class in remote
    Implements Read/Write access to the stock list, the stock list is held in a relational DataBase.
    R_StockRW(String) - Constructor for class remote.R_StockRW
    All transactions are done via StockRW to ensure that a single connection to the database is used for all transactions
    remote - package remote
     
    RemoteMiddleFactory - Class in middle
    Provide access to middle tier components.
    RemoteMiddleFactory() - Constructor for class middle.RemoteMiddleFactory
     
    RemoteOrder_I - Interface in remote
    Defines the RMI interface for the Order object.
    RemoteStockR_I - Interface in remote
    Defines the RMI interface for read access to the stock object.
    RemoteStockRW_I - Interface in remote
    Defines the RMI interface for read/write access to the stock object.
    revert() - Static method in class debug.DEBUG
    Revert to previous debuging state (Not nested)
